fields.Name: Skip AssociationDB - Member Lifetime Value by Join Year
fields.Description: Tests Skip's ability to perform cohort analysis by calculating average lifetime value for members grouped by their join year.

InputDefinition.userMessage: Calculate the average lifetime value (total revenue generated) for members grouped by the year they joined, and show how this has changed over time in a chart.

judgeValidationCriteria: Response includes a chart showing average lifetime value by join year cohort
Lifetime value is calculated as total revenue per member
Members are grouped by join year
Chart shows trend over different cohorts
Values are properly formatted as currency
